page.title: 112 Sheerness Girls' Clubs
page.content: Two girls told us about their {clubs,}one told us about dancing. She goes to competitions all over the country. Her{dancing}school is at Sandwich Bay, 40 miles from Sheppey. Her dancing lesson lasts for 2 hours and costs Â£6, during which she gets one 5 minute break. The same girl also goes swimming, ice skating and roller skating whenever she can. 9 girls regularly attend{Girls' {Brigade.}One of the girls wrote,"At Girls' Brigade we do drill, Bible drama and making things.We do these things on a Monday night. There is also a{brass band}and they have lessons on a Tuesday. Also we go on alsorts of trips and take part in competitions for team games and drill and we do displays."
